title: 36th Annual Holiday Treasure Hunt and Tea Party
description:
Join us for a one-of-a-kind exploration of art during this festive family program.

Learn about select works and enjoy an array of fun activities as you visit five stops within the museum’s galleries and the Ryan Learning Center. After this lively expedition, stop by the historic Stock Exchange Trading Room for a Tea Party featuring delicious refreshments and live entertainment.

Upgrade to the VIP level for reserved seating at the tea party, a deluxe hot chocolate bar, and a special goodie bag for each child.

Choose one of three start times: 10:45, 12:00, or 1:30.

For the most up-to-date information, follow the Auxiliary Board on Facebook or contact Roberta Neuhausler at (312) 443-3674 or rneuhausler@artic.edu. For additional holiday programs, please visit the holiday programs calendar.
